creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
/jakarta/isapi_redirect.dll

is logged in the IIS log files instead of the requested URL.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
As work around you can use W3C extended Log File format and include the Referer 
column.

It's not a major bug, with workarounds - and is difficult to debug with IIS.
Probably won't be fixed in 3.3, but in a future release of mod_jk.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com

text:
Created attachment 670
code for jk_isapi_plugin.c to workaround this problem.
creator: mike@ds808.net
